messages.subject: re:helping 7 year old play piano
messages.msgSnippet: Thank-you for the suggestions thus far.  I like the response to Dr. Phil s suggestion to finish everything!  I had to laugh, because this is part of my issue
messages.messageBody:
Thank-you for the suggestions thus far. I like the response to Dr.
Phil's suggestion to finish everything! I had to laugh, because this
is part of my issue with this process - it does feel like we're
quitting and I feel guilty about it, even though honoring where the
kids are at feels important as well. Boy, I can be complicated!

My ds enjoys reading music that is designed so that your five fingers
don't move off their notes - but you play them when the music says so.
Lots of simple tunes are written in books like this - so I think I
may search that out and put it back on the piano so he can fiddle
around with it more easily.

Michele
